listitem.para: All security updates issued for UCS 4.4-1 are included:

listitem.simpara: ghostscript (49998 50149)
subversion (49948)

listitem.para:
The following updated packages from Debian 9.11 are included (50211):
base-files basez biomaj-watcher bird bogl chaosreader c-icap-modules corekeeper dansguardian dar debian-archive-keyring debian-installer-netboot-images debian-installer dosbox fence-agents fig2dev fribidi fusiondirectory gettext gocode groonga gsoap gthumb havp icu koji lemonldap-ng libclamunrar libconvert-units-perl libdatetime-timezone-perl libevent-rpc-perl libgovirt librecad libsdl2-image libthrift-java libtk-img libu2f-host linux-latest liquidsoap llvm-toolchain-7 minissdpd miniupnpd mitmproxy monkeysphere nasm-mozilla ncbi-tools6 neovim nginx node-growl node-ws opendmarc openssh open-vm-tools passwordsafe pound prelink python-clamav redis reportbug resiprocate ruby-mini-magick sash signing-party slurm-llnl t-digest tenshi thunderbird tzdata usbutils xymon yubico-piv-tool z3 zfs-auto-snapshot zsh

The following packages have been moved to the maintained repository of UCS:
python-concurrent.futures (49973) python-mimeparse (49973) python-uritemplate (50034)

listitem.simpara: Fix regression in 221 which caused the univention-service files to be not installed any more (50098).
Restarting, starting and stopping of various services has been fixed (42241).
An Error in the syntax-evaluation of the attribute preferredDeliveryMethod has been fixed (49930).
Fix univention-translog stat check for index (49872).
The maximum number of open sockets can now be set using the &ucsUCRV; dns/max-socks (49493).
Traceback dialogs may now hide the button to directly send the traceback to the vendor. Instead, only the mail button is shown (46790).
The detail page of UDM objects failed to open sometimes (49768).
The progress bar interval is now configurable via the backend of modules. Error handling of progress bars has been enhanced (48002).
Added SuggestionBox widget (48811).
It's now possible to search for users based on group membership (42607).
The new type interface of UDM is used in the UDM REST API (50047).
The new binary package univention-directory-manager-rest provides a &ucsUDM; REST HTTP service (50034).
The portal server is restarted after the initial system setup. (50235)
Fix regression in 230 which caused the univention-service file to be not installed any more (50169).
The error message when connecting to a module process fails is now mentioning the actual module name (43225).
Multiple parallel authentication requests are now correctly handled by the UMC web server (47106).

It is now prevented that the UMC web server creates multiple new connections for a session after the connection to the UMC server was closed and multiple parallel requests from the old session are requested (49929).
The progress bar interval is now configurable via the backend of modules (48002).
The security for authentication requests has been improved (44602).
A problem in the update from docker to docker-compose Apps has been fixed (50196).
Simplified the way the App Provider and the App Vendor are presented in the UMC module (50106).
The data directory of the Prometheus App had a change in its group ownership due to the new docker version, which handles things differently (50113).
Removing old docker images may have caused a traceback (50113).
Old docker images are now removed after an App upgrade (49486).
Fixed the reinitialize command on non-Master roles (50082).
Docker Apps can now be reinitialized when necessary. This copies the current settings into a new container. To be used internally by App Providers (50057).
Multi Container Apps may now use the App Settings to control their docker-compose file (50030).

Multi-container Apps now use a subnet managed by the App Center instead of creating arbitrary networks. This caused problems with firewalls and existing networks. The network can be configured by the &ucsUCRV; appcenter/docker/compose/network, which defaults to 172.16.1.1/16. This change takes effect with new App installations (49055).
Due to privacy concerns, the App Center does not send the domain UUID and system UUID in the tracking information of 'search' actions anymore (49955).
An errata update caused the App Tab in the Users UMC module to not be visible. This update re-synchronizes the listener so that the App Tab is visible again (49832).
A new App Setting DockerUcrStyleEnv was added to be able to deactivate passing environment variables into docker containers that are not in the format of capital letters and underscores (49647).
The app badges icons in the App Center are replaced with new versions (49284).

section.title: &ucsUDM; UMC modules and command line interface

listitem.simpara: The new binary package univention-directory-manager-rest provides a &ucsUDM; REST HTTP service and is installed on Domaincontroller Master and Domaincontroller Backup Systems by default (50171, 27816).
The syntax classes IStates, AllowDeny, AppActivatedOK, AppActivatedTrue, OkOrNot, TrueFalse, TrueFalseUp, TrueFalseUpper, booleanNone and ddnsUpdates now correctly validate input values (40731).
A new type interface has been introduced. Every syntax class and property may now specify a data type, which is used in the UDM REST API (50047).
The fallback language for extended attribute translations is now based on the primary language of the locale. Austrian German will then be translated in German instead of English (47961).

The UDM module users/user properties departmentNumber and roomNumber have been changed to be multi-value, as allowed in the LDAP schema. This change has been made to support synchronization with Samba/AD (49092).

The following properties have been added to the UDM module users/user: initials, postOfficeBox, preferredLanguage, physicalDeliveryOfficeName, preferredDeliveryMethod. The UDM module users/user has been prepared for adding the following properties: st (state) and c (country) Any extended attribute for those properties should be changed to use the same property name as CLIName (49092).
The printer objects are now created again in the printer default containers instead of the shares default container (49826).
The combobox syntax class has been added (48811).
An error in the creation of container/ou objects has been fixed (49478).
It is now checked if containers are movable before moving them to avoid having to revert the changes in case the move failed (49234).
Nagios objects are created again in their default containers (49594).
Searching for users in a certain group is now possible (42607).

section.title: Modules for system settings / setup wizard

listitem.simpara: Make the local appliance package cache readable for the user _apt to fix an error with the Acquire::GzipIndexes=true option set for apt (49799).
Errors that happen in the appliance wizard are now shown. The user may send a mail with the traceback to Univention (46790).
New plugin to check univentionServerRole for Windows computer objects (49958).
Adapt file permission check for /var/cache/univention-system-setup/ (49799).
Plugins taking longer than 10 minutes do not cause timeout errors anymore (48002).
The binary package univention-management-module-udm has been moved into the source package univention-directory-manager-rest (50034).
Fix regression in 216 which caused the univention-service file to be not installed any more (50169).
In multi edit mode it is now possible to enable or disable apps and options individually (49829).
The detail page of UDM objects failed to open sometimes. This issue has been resolved (49768).
SuggestionBox has been added to the mapping of syntax classes (48811).
It's now possible to search for users based on group membership (42607).

The UCR templates for LDAP ACLs on DC Slave systems have been split from 60univention-ldap-server_acl-slave into 60univention-ldap-server_acl-slave and 70univention-ldap-server_acl-slave-end. The rule which allows read access for every user to every object is contained in the later one. This increases security for templates which are installed on the DC Master and DC Slaves where the same behavior is now present (49734).
Attaching UMC policies during rejoin failed because the machine account credentials were used. Now the Administrator credentials are used again (49592).
Situations where operations are performed during a restart of the OpenLDAP server will trigger a reconnection in the uldap.py utilities (47926).
The univention-service definition has been corrected and split into two services for PostgreSQL 9.4 and PostgreSQL 9.6 (42241).
Invalid default values for the pre existing service provider LDAP entries have been repaired (50177).
The package has been adjusted for the update to simplesamlphp version 1.16.3 (48961).
Fix UCR template for SSL certificate &ucsUCRV; mail/dovecot/ssl/cafile (50105).
The postfix service can be managed via the System Services UMC module again (42241).
Fix that the listener module wasn't shown as initialized (48886).
Improve warning for missing sambaNTPassword attribute (49499).
Use UCR port configuration for IPv6 RADIUS-server (49858).
The radius authentication performance has been improved. This should be especially noticeable in large environments (50006).

pam_krb5 now strips passwords at 1024 characters. This prevents denial of service attacks when authenticating with very long passwords when pam_krb5 would hang in the hash generation of the password (49740).

pam_unix now strips passwords at 512 characters. This prevents denial of service attacks when authenticating with very long passwords when pam_unix would hang in the hash generation of the password. (49741).
Disable PAM module systemd by default. It can be re-enabled by setting the &ucsUCRV; pam/session/systemd to true (49910).
A locking mechanism for ldap-group-to-file.py has been implemented so that it is ensured the process only runs once at a time (35173).
Restarting, starting and stopping of various services has been fixed (42241).
The error handling in case of connection loss has been enhanced. The amount of log messages has been reduced to decrease log size (49737).
The CPU model can now be configured for each Virtual Machine (49695).
It is now possible to always start Virtual Machines automatically on host startup via the UMC module (28771).
The LDAP attribute univentionVirtualMachineProfileCPUModel has been added to the schema and the UDM module uvmm/profile (49695).
The package now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/ (49177).
The Samba 4 service can now be managed via the System Services UMC module (42241).
Fixes GPO link synchronization during AD-Takeover (44278).
Fix regression in 239 which caused the univention-service file to be not installed any more (50098).
Fix a traceback observed in CI tests, where a computer object had already been purged in OpenLDAP and the connector tried to apply the echo operation for a prior modification in OpenLDAP (49959).
Avoid a traceback in case GPO deletes get synchronized to Samba/AD and the entryUUID of a sub-object is unknown (49956).
Fixed typo in log message (49918).
Stop adding an unlimited number of lock entries for the same object (49459).

The file /etc/univention/connector/s4/localmapping.py is now included in mapping.py to allow adjusting the mapping dynamically. It may contain a Python function mapping_hook(s4_mapping) which can return a modified mapping (48410).
Unused code has been removed (43068).
Fixed access to undefined variable in the sync_krbgt script (36633).
A reject is prevented when trying to add a group which is already removed in UCS (49850).
Samba 4.9 no longer allows the removal of the dBCSPwd (NTLM hash) attribute. The S4 connector now respects this (49905).

These additional attributes are now synchronized between UDM/OpenLDAP and Samba/AD: unixhome, employeeType, employeeNumber, loginShell, title, gidNumber, uidNumber, departmentNumber, roomNumber, jpegPhoto, userCertificate, initials, physicalDeliveryOfficeName, postOfficeBox, preferredLanguage. The synchronization of user attributes can now be switched on and off via the new &ucsUCRV; connector/s4/mapping/user/attributes/ignorelist. For updates, the synchronization of these attributes is switched off. For new installations, the synchronization of these attributes is switched on (49092).
Objects containing a ? character in their DN could not be synchronized due to a decoding error. The synchronization works now (49865).
The script remove_ucs_rejected.py has been repaired. It has been broken via 155 (26501).
Update links in the UMC to UCS 4.4 documentation (48027).
The scripts remove_ucs_rejected.py and remove_ad_rejected.py now escape SQL syntax (49640).
Update package dependencies (49978).
